item.title: Euclidean Alignment and Weighted Transfer Learning on MI-based BCI
item.description: Here comes my first experiment combining two TL techniques for BCI in two different BCI steps. Now, before going further into details here’s the outline of this blog : Basic BCI Steps and TL in BCI Euclidean Alignment (EA) Weighted Transfer Learning (wLTL) EA-wLTL Attempt To keep it sane, I will try to introduce each section as minimum as possible without leaving crucial points. In the end section I will show my result, which and possible future improvement.
